title: Sword Art Online 1-25 [1080p] [Dual Audio] [Eng-Jap] ~Chrisazter
description:
This is an op by Chrisazter213 on Nyaa. #493477
OP>>-----------------------------------------------------------------------------

Thanks to TheTanStar for BD English Audio
Thanks to [Coalgirls] for BD Video,Jap Audio,and Jap Subs
Thanks to moodkiller for getting me the English Audio Subs for parts 1,3

I Used MKVMerge to mux together the sources. I also used Aegisub to create english audio subs for part 4(Part 2
already had english audio subs from my dvd source.)

So this release is : 1920x1080p,Dual Audio(with all English/Japanese Audio from Bluray!),Also there is a seperate 
sub track for english signs/songs for EVERY episode, Each episode is also properly titled.

Sorry to those that were Downloading/Seeding Parts 1-3, but I took them down because this release has better quality audio (Bluray compared to DVD) as well as English Audio Subs for signs/songs.

Please seed at atleast 1:1 and enjoy : )

My Future Releases on Nyaa:
~~~Done for 2013, might be back in Q1 or Q2 in 2014...depends on my living situation if I will be able to upload or not. I will not be able to reseed until then so please keep these alive.
